CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: To verify the accuracy of the J sc measurement results , external quantum efficiencies ( EQEs ) of solar cells were measured under illumination of monochromatic light.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| monochromatic light |

Explanation:

The term "monochromatic light" is the only material-related entity mentioned in the paragraph. It is a type of light that has only one wavelength or color. The other terms, such as "J sc measurement results" and "external quantum efficiencies (EQEs) of solar cells," refer to measurement techniques or properties of materials rather than the materials themselves.
